title: OMOP Semantic Layer
description:
# Healthcare Analytics - OMOP CDM Intelligence

Query and analyze healthcare data using natural language across patient populations, clinical encounters, conditions, medications, lab results, and provider performance.

## What You Can Ask About

- **👥 Patient Demographics** - Population breakdowns by age, gender, race, ethnicity, and location
- **🏥 Healthcare Utilization** - Visit patterns, encounter types, length of stay, ER usage rates
- **🩺 Disease Management** - Condition prevalence, diagnosis trends, chronic disease burden
- **💊 Medication Analysis** - Drug utilization, adherence, prescribing patterns, chronic therapy
- **🔬 Clinical Measurements** - Lab results, vital signs, abnormal values, quality metrics
- **🏥 Provider Analytics** - Panel sizes, productivity, patient volumes, workload
- **📊 Quality Metrics** - Blood pressure control, diabetes management (HbA1c), preventive care
